content:
Hello,
I think I found some copy/paste mistake on the bodyweight and body height profile (http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/bodyweight.html and http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/bodyheight.html)
The component element is set to "mustSupport" with the comment:
"Used when reporting systolic and diastolic blood pressure."
I'm not specialist, but I don't think there is a link between bodyheight, bodyweight and blood pressure at this stage.

(I hope it Is the right place to put this kind of question/remark )

Best regards,
David
yes quite the right place. Do you want to create a change proposal to fix it up?
I suppose that I have to do the Change proposal on Github right ?
no we use Jira - link at the bottom of the page that contains the error
Thanks, I will create the change request.
